nodes.text: The Lothalian Corvette was a starship model that saw action at the Battle of Exegol in 35 ABY. Multiple vessels of this corvette class were part of a citizens' fleet of volunteer civilians from throughout the galaxy who ensured the Resistance's victory over the Sith forces on Exegol, and at least one Lothalian Corvette joined the victory celebrations hosted by the Resistance at their base on the planet Ajan Kloss shortly after the battle.
Lothalian was another name for Lothalites, a culture group of humans from the planet Lothal.

The Lothalian Corvette bears visual similarities with the Defender-class light corvette, which was developed for the 2011 Star Wars Legends video game Star Wars: The Old Republic with design elements from the Consular-class space cruiser, the CR90 corvette, and the Ebon Hawk, and was the basis of the Paladin-class corvette's design.
